attributes.action: make parking meters that do not give change illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that it is unfair that, in the event of my not having exact money for a parking meter/machine, I am effectively forced to overpay. 

This appears to be the case all over the country and is allowing local authorities to overcharge for the 'service' of providing parking facilities.

If I buy any other product from a 'vending machine' I, rightly, expect change to be provided. I believe this should be the case for parking meters also.
